name: Vinamra Bansal
position: Chief Technical Officer @ Shri Modi Group | Ex - Product Manager, Supply @ P&G | Ex - Risk & Fraud Control Business Analyst @ OLA Financial Services | IIT BHU
about: Vinamra Bansal, a B.Tech graduate in Mining Engineering from IIT BHU, is a driven professional known for his project management expertise, technical proficiency, and ambitious approach to leadership. As Chief Technical Officer of Shri Modi Group, Jaipur, he led the complete greenfield development of a 100+ TPH Kaolin manufacturing facility, optimizing operations across multiple factories and mines while enhancing product quality, reporting systems, and project execution. His tenure at Procter & Gamble saw him managing a team of 15+ technical executives, ensuring seamless production of leading FMCG brands through strong stakeholder management and problem-solving skills. He also excelled as a Business Analyst at OLA Financial Services, driving fraud control initiatives, and as a Product Manager at Ed-Tech startup MyAnalyticsSchool, contributing to strategic business and technological growth. His consistent drive for excellence and ability to navigate complex projects highlight his technical depth, leadership, and ambitious mindset.

current_company.name: Shri Modi Group Jaipur
current_company.title: Chief Technical Officer @ Shri Modi Group | Ex - Product Manager, Supply @ P&G | Ex - Risk & Fraud Control Business Analyst @ OLA Financial Services | IIT BHU

experience.title: Chief Technical Officer
experience.description: Industry Set-up- Spearheading the setting up of a Greenfield project of more than 100 tonnes per hour ore in-feed for the manufacturing of Kaolinite Mineral. - Overseeing a team in different departments like Operations (Plant managers, Machine operators, blue collar workers), Civil + facilities + Infrastructure Contractors, Yellow Goods (JCB, Dumper, Excavators), Purchases, Legal, Accounting etc. - Headed the Compliances fulfilment for - Licensing, Legal compliances, Bank Finance and New Company Establishment procedure, Accounting.- Designed the factory site plan, plumbing, mechanical and electrical (MEP) design along with architects for economical and agile plant set up. Existing Plant Functions - Managing the new initiatives, their feasibility & implementation in old plants. - Designed a Fluid bed dryer integrated with rotary drum dryer and cyclone for quicker material dryer.- Machine designing R&D and their installation in factories to solve production lags and integrate automation. - Overseeing 3 plant sites and 3 mines of Kaolinite.- Continuously improving the processes by redesigning the bottlenecks like plumbing & electrical layouts. Mines Function - Overseeing mining contractors, reporting and 3 Kaolinite Mines. - Integrated periodic Drone surveys in SOP for proper excavation analysis and monthly blasting and Overburden removal planning.

Existing Plant Functions - Managing the new initiatives, their feasibility & implementation in old plants. - Designed a Fluid bed dryer integrated with rotary drum dryer and cyclone for quicker material dryer.- Machine designing R&D and their installation in factories to solve production lags and integrate automation. - Overseeing 3 plant sites and 3 mines of Kaolinite.- Continuously improving the processes by redesigning the bottlenecks like plumbing & electrical layouts. Mines Function - Overseeing mining contractors, reporting and 3 Kaolinite Mines. - Integrated periodic Drone surveys in SOP for proper excavation analysis and monthly blasting and Overburden removal planning.

experience.title: Product Manager - Hair Care Packing
experience.description: - Managing the production of Head & Shoulders and Pantene Sachets for the Indian Sub-Continent.- Leading a team of 16 Technical Executives for efficient production and supply of the product.- Ensuring meeting of the quality standards of State of the Art production lines.- Coaching and direction setting of the team members for zero loss journey of the productions lines.- Owning the capability of Loss Elimination Tools Pillar for the entire site (Managers + Technical Executives = approx 300+ site employees)- Coached new managers on tools of LE Pillar along with the SME

experience.title: Business Analyst - Fraud Control, Risk and Collections
experience.description: - Worked as Business Analyst for OLA Financial Services (OLA Money) in the Risk, Collections and Fraud Control Team.- Derived Insights to set proper parameters for the merchant transactions to ensure minimal risk.- Identified routes through which fraud might happen and eliminated them via building alerting mechanisms.- Developed codes to filter out potential fraudsters for further investigation.- Maintained reporting of business insights on daily basis to track Key Performance Indicators for OLA Money

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: -Designed the Learning Management System (LMS) using Figma.-Built an LMS MVP using tools like Softr for frontend and Airtable as backend, to be used for the consolidation of resources in a repository, to be used for announcements about sessions and programs, for daily task allocation and to provide the customers a one stop solution for all their needs in the program journey.-Built a customer progress tracking mobile application using tools like Glide for the frontend and Google Sheets and Glide combined for the backend.-Surveyed and interviewed customers to understand their needs and pain points, and resolved them using technological intervention as well as business decisions.-Recommended strategic features like student tracking, leaderboards, progress analytics, resource consolidation etc. to improve the overall UX, accountability of students, engagement in the program and in turn provide the customers seamless experience of the product.-Helped the management team to take business decisions for the scaling of the startup. Conducted sessions in various universities and colleges along with the team to market the company and in-turn increase the customer base by 4x.

Vinamra is just like his name - humble and always has a knack for learning something new, while making sure of teaching his learnings with fellow teams and peers. Vinamra is dedicated, passionate and has a creative way of getting tasks at hand done! I learnt a lot just in the duration of 2 1/2 months from Vinamra. His skills in Product Sense, Presentations, No code tools and other aspects of Product Management are outstanding. Vinamra will be an asset to any organization he'll be a part of.
